website_summaries.verdict: Trusted manufacturer of dinnerware with a beautiful holiday scene showcased.
pros: Design of these plates and cups features excellent artwork and holiday colors
Has 24K gold accents around the edge of each piece
Dishwasher-safe items are made in the United States
cons: A little pricey for a 12-piece set
Not safe to use in a microwave

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dinnerware, dishwasher safe too
customer_reviews.text: Such a pretty dinnerware set. Plates are not white, but more of a cream color. The mugs are better than little tea cups, both my husband and I agree on this point since we are coffee/cocoa drinkers. The bird and ribbon decoration will add to the beauty of my table for the holidays!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous set for the holidays
customer_reviews.text: these plates, mugs and dessert dishes are simply outstanding. What a nice pretty addition to any holiday table. The finest in Lenox quality, translucent china with wonderful detail and colors. A charming set rimmed in gold will add to your holiday delight. Do not hesitate to purchase this. Although others have said you can place this in the dishwasher, I don't do this,I always hand wash and dry. Why; because it brings women and men together to "be in one place, working together, and enjoying each other's company". Just like the "old days"...we so frequently forget how to connect with one another.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Love these dishes
customer_reviews.text: Love these dishes. Just as advertised .Well packaged . I’m sure I’ll enjoyed them every Christmas. Good seller.
customer_reviews.author: lola

customer_reviews.title: Great holiday china
customer_reviews.text: My wife picked out this set and I thought I would surprise her and get it for her. Wonderful china well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: kb0sdq

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dinnerware
customer_reviews.text: The pictures don't do the dishes justice. They are beautiful! The gold trim on the edge gives the dishes a very elegant look. I am very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: V. Pfander

customer_reviews.title: lorri
customer_reviews.text: I love this Christmas china. Was going to purchase another design and came across the winter greetings. Love that is is made in the USA all but for the mugs. Like another review, I also wish they had the birds on the mugs. I just bought the 4 piece place setting but will continue to add to it over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Lorri

customer_reviews.title: beautiful dishes!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my 12-piece dinnerware set and the dishes are absolutely lovely!!!! They were very carefully packed and arrived in perfect condition even though the outer box was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Lenox Winter Greetings
customer_reviews.text: Bought Lenox Winter Greetings dinnerware for my daughter for her birthday. She has been wanting this dinnerware for a few years, and when she opened her gift her eyes lit up. They are beautiful and elegant looking. Wish Lenox would make more accessory pieces to enhance the set.
customer_reviews.author: Ronni

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: These are really beautiful dishes, well worth the cost. They will become family heirlooms. I bought these for my sister, she has been looking for these forever
customer_reviews.author: melanie kearney

customer_reviews.title: Very classic and lovely. We will use them for ...
customer_reviews.text: Very classic and lovely. We will use them for a long time and then pass them along to our children.
customer_reviews.author: Dorene Strom

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous dishes!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my mother who just loves cardinals. This set went on sale and was cheaper than Lenox.com. I am very please with them. They were brand new. Nicely packed in original box. Perfect set for lunch. You can add pieces if you like. They are gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: sage4901

customer_reviews.title: Lenox Winter Greetings
customer_reviews.text: I love this china. I now have 8 place settings.I do wash it by hand and I don't put it in the microwave because of the gold rim. I do think I will bring it out earlier next year. It makes a beautiful table. I am glad I chose the mug rather than the cup & saucer.
customer_reviews.author: PMS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with quality. Wish the tea cups had birds & more details
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Christmas Set
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very fast. It's a Christmas gift for my daughter. She will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Santa Fe KK

customer_reviews.title: So glad I found these
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a Christmas set of China and knew when I saw these this was a set for me. Love the birds and I just wish I had bought earlier so I could have enjoyed them longer. The mugs feel wonderful in your hands. Everyone that saw them in my home commented how nice they looked . Very Festive
customer_reviews.author: Charlene C. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love Lenox and I love birds so this was perfect for me when choosing a Christmas china. Every year I try to add a piece or two to my collection. It is one of my most treasured collections.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Lilli

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Wait
customer_reviews.text: When Amazon has a lenox product you cannot beat THE PRICE. I waited for these dishes a long time - don't- order and enjoy -the quality is superb! The price cannot be beaten. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: David Hesse

product_meta.title: Lenox Winter Greetings 12-Piece Dinnerware Set
product_meta.description:
Style Name:12-Piece Set, Service for 4Artistic splendor to brighten your holiday table, Winter Greetings is one of Lenox's most treasured heritage patterns. Bearing the acclaimed artistry of Catherine McClung, the festive design is an intricate composition of garden birds, red and gold bows and holly. Rich in color, decorate your table to warm cranberry and pine hughes. With our corporate office located in Pennsylvania and our fine dinnerware factory in Kinston, North Carolina we are proud to be a part of American tradition. With all of the craftsmanship and quality for which a pattern is known, it is no surprise that Winter Greetings is a treasured collection in homes worldwide. Crafted of Lenox ivory bone china accented with 24 karat gold, Lenox Winter Greetings fine dinnerware is made in the USA by American artisans and is dishwasher safe for your convenience. Best of all, this classic collection is created by Lenox, America's first name in home entertaining, known around the world for offering a unique combination of design artistry and superior quality for over 125 years. The confidence that Lenox has in the unmatched durability of every product they offer is backed by a lifetime breakage replacement policy to guarantee many years of enjoyment to each customer. Get set for stylish seasonal celebrations with 4 Dinner Plates, 4 Salad Plates and 4 Mugs from the classic Lenox Winter Greetings Collection.

AMAZON.COM
Bird lovers take note: this dinnerware collection lets you keep an eye on cardinals, chickadees, and nuthatches right at the table. Designed by artist Catherine McClung and crafted of Lenox ivory fine china, each Winter Greetings plate in this 12-piece set is bordered by a wreath of birds, greenery, and ribbons and trimmed with 24-karat gold for a festive formal look. The mugs are encircled by a simple bough tied with a red bow. The set includes four place settings, each consisting of a 10-3/4-inch dinner plate, 8-1/2-inch salad plate, and 12-ounce mug. 

 Lenox backs its products with a lifetime warranty, and will replace any unsatisfactory item or provide the customer a full refund. In addition, under its lifetime breakage replacement program, Lenox will replace any broken piece that is in stock at 50 percent off the current suggested retail price. --Ann Bieri 

 What's in the Box
4 place settings. Each place setting consists of: dinner plate; salad plate; mug. 12 pieces total.
feature_bullets: 10.5 inch D Dinner Plate, 8 inch D Salad Plate, 12 ounce Mug
Crafted of Bone China and Accented with 24K Gold
Made in the USA. Chip Resistant
Backed by the Lenox Lifetime Breakage Replacement Program
